Full Stack Application

IoT Based Real-time Pulse Monitoring and Geolocation Alerting system

Capstone Project

Developed a cost-effective and convenient emergency IoT solution to provide immediate help for hypertensive patients at optimal times.

Improved the overall response to get immediate help by 29% in urban and 51% in rural areas.

Published a Research paper at International Journal of Engineering Research & Technology.

ParkSafe

Inrix Hackathon

As part of the Hackathon organized by Inrix, we built a custom-developed API that provides available parking spots with the most safety factor within one mile. By safety factor, it means how likely is your car vulnerable to vehicle-related crimes(such as Larceny, arson, etc.). More the safety factor, safer is it to park your car at that particular spot.

ParkSafe is a Flask-based web application that implements the Parksafe API which helps vehicle owners stay worry-free by identifying parking spots that are safe from theft and break-ins by mapping out crimes through historical data.

Lifesaver

Blood bank management system

The project aims to create an optimized and efficient database for blood donations with modern designed desktop UI using Tkinter, Oracle Autonomous Database, and Oracle Cloud Infrastructure.
